participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Larry is a passionate and creative individual who loves to express himself through cooking and fishing. He enjoys exploring new recipes and sharing his culinary creations with others.
participant_1.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing.

participant_2.name: Anaya
participant_2.personality: Anaya is an adventurous spirit with a love for technology and sports. She is determined and expressive, often pushing boundaries to embrace her free-spirited nature.
participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
